homes_hear_details: South Dakota has not yet launched its HOMES or HEAR rebate programs under the Inflation Reduction Act. The South Dakota Governor's Office of Economic Development is the designated state entity, and program design is still in early stages.
state_energy_office: South Dakota Governor's Office of Economic Development

income_thresholds.low_income_80_ami: For South Dakota, 80% of Area Median Income varies by county. In Minnehaha County (Sioux Falls), 80% AMI for a family of four is approximately $66,300. In Pennington County (Rapid City), it is approximately $59,050.
income_thresholds.moderate_income_150_ami: For South Dakota, 150% of Area Median Income varies by county. In Minnehaha County (Sioux Falls), 150% AMI for a family of four is approximately $124,350. In Pennington County (Rapid City), it is approximately $110,700.

net_metering: South Dakota has a net metering policy for systems up to 100 kW. Investor-owned utilities are required to offer net metering, with customers receiving credit at the retail rate for excess generation. Credits carry forward monthly with an annual true-up.

state_rebate_programs.name: Weatherization Assistance Program
state_rebate_programs.administrator: South Dakota Department of Social Services
state_rebate_programs.amount: Average expenditure of approximately $6,500 per home
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Insulation, air sealing, heating system repair or replacement, windows, doors
state_rebate_programs.details: Federally funded program for income-qualifying households at or below 200% of federal poverty level. Administered through community action agencies across South Dakota.

programs.name: Black Hills Energy Residential Rebates
programs.amount: Up to $500 for high-efficiency furnaces, $200 for water heaters, $50 for smart thermostats
programs.eligible_items: High-efficiency natural gas furnaces, tankless water heaters, smart thermostats, insulation

programs.name: Home Energy Audit
programs.amount: Free or reduced-cost home energy assessment
programs.eligible_items: Comprehensive home energy evaluation with recommendations

programs.name: Xcel Energy Residential Rebates
programs.amount: Up to $800 for heat pumps, $300 for insulation, $75 for smart thermostats
programs.eligible_items: High-efficiency heat pumps, central air conditioners, insulation, smart thermostats

programs.name: Residential Energy Efficiency Rebates
programs.eligible_items: High-efficiency HVAC, insulation, ENERGY STAR appliances
